com.aevi.print.driver.common

Class PrinterDriverBase<T extends BasePrinterInfo>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aevi.print.driver.common.PrinterDriverBase<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The class that has been derived from BasePrinterInfo

    public abstract class PrinterDriverBase<T extends BasePrinterInfo>
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides a common framework to simplify the implementation of a printer printer driver. It works with a manufactures POS receipt printer SDK that either uses blocking API calls or non-blocking API and callbacks. All methods called in this class are thread safe and so can be called from different threads.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PrinterDriverBase

        public PrinterDriverBase(BasePrinterInfo printerInfo)
        The constructor for PrinterDriverBase
        Parameters:
        printerInfo - The class providing the details of the printer

    • Method Detail

      • getPrinterInfo

        public T getPrinterInfo()
        Get the information on the printer being used
        Returns:
        The class providing the details of the printer

      • connectToPrinter

        protected abstract void connectToPrinter()
        The implementation of this method should open a connection to the printer. When the connection has completed successfully then the method onPrinterConnected() should be called. If there is an error during the connection then onDriverError(java.lang.String, java.lang.String) should be called instead.

      • disconnectFromPrinter

        protected abstract void disconnectFromPrinter()
        The implementation of this method should close the connection to the printer and call onPrinterDisconnected() on completion or alternatively call onDriverError(java.lang.String, java.lang.String) if there has been an error.

      • executePrintPayloadTask

        protected abstract void executePrintPayloadTask(com.aevi.print.model.PrintPayload printPayload)
        This method is called after the printer connection has been made and when there is data ready to be printed. The implementation of this method should convert the printer payload to a form the printer will accept and then send it the printer. When the printing has been completed successfully call onTaskCompletedSuccessfully(). Otherwise if there is an error call onPrintingFailed(java.lang.String, java.lang.String) or onDriverError(java.lang.String, java.lang.String) instead.
        Parameters:
        printPayload - the printer payload that is be printed.

      • executePrintActionTask

        protected abstract void executePrintActionTask(java.lang.String printAction)
        This method is called is called after the printer connection has been made and when there is a printer action to be carried by the printer. The method onTaskCompletedSuccessfully() should be called on completion or call onDriverError(java.lang.String, java.lang.String) or onActionFailed(java.lang.String, java.lang.String) when there has been an error.
        Parameters:
        printAction - The print action command to be carried out by the printer (e.g. open the cash drawer)

      • onPrinterConnected

        public void onPrinterConnected()
        This method must be called after making a successful connection to the printer and the printer is ready for the next task.

      • onPrinterDisconnected

        public void onPrinterDisconnected()
        This method must be called after the connection to the printer has been closed. Calling onDriverError(java.lang.String, java.lang.String) instead will also mark the connection as closed.

      • print

        public io.reactivex.Observable<com.aevi.print.model.PrintJob> print(com.aevi.print.model.PrintPayload printPayload)
        It is intended that this method is only called from the CommonPrinterDriverService class. and so it should not be necessary to call this method directly.
        Parameters:
        printPayload - The payload to print
        Returns:
        An observable stream of PrintJob data which indicates the status of the printout

      • sendPrinterAction

        public void sendPrinterAction(java.lang.String printAction)
        It is intended that this method is only called from the CommonPrinterActionService class. and so it should not be necessary to call this method directly.
        Parameters:
        printAction - The printer action to perform

      • onTaskCompletedSuccessfully

        public void onTaskCompletedSuccessfully()
        This method must be called when a task (see executePrintPayloadTask(com.aevi.print.model.PrintPayload) or executePrintActionTask(java.lang.String)) has been completed successfully. If there is error then call onDriverError(java.lang.String, java.lang.String) onPrintingFailed(java.lang.String, java.lang.String) or onActionFailed(java.lang.String, java.lang.String) instead.

      • onDriverError

        public void onDriverError(java.lang.String failedReason,
                          java.lang.String diagnosticMessage)
        Called when there has been an error and no other task can continue e.g. when the printer is offline. All other tasks are then are cancelled and disconnectFromPrinter() will not be called automatically. It is the responsibility of the implementation to ensure everything is closed down before this method is called.
        Parameters:
        failedReason - The reason giving the cause of any failure
        diagnosticMessage - A diagnostic message to include with the failedReason

      • onPrintingFailed

        public void onPrintingFailed(java.lang.String failedReason,
                             java.lang.String diagnosticMessage)
        Called when printing failed but other task can continue (e.g. if printer is out of paper then the cash drawer can still be opened). disconnectFromPrinter() will then be called automatically when all other tasks have completed.
        Parameters:
        failedReason - The reason giving the cause of any failure
        diagnosticMessage - A diagnostic message to include with the failedReason

      • onActionFailed

        public void onActionFailed(java.lang.String failedReason,
                           java.lang.String diagnosticMessage)
        Called when sending a printer action has failed but other task can continue disconnectFromPrinter() will then be called automatically when all task have completed.
        Parameters:
        failedReason - The reason giving the cause of any failure
        diagnosticMessage - A diagnostic message to include with the failedReason

      • emitPrinterStatus

        public void emitPrinterStatus(java.lang.String status)
        Sends a printer status message to any registered observers.
        Parameters:
        status - the printer status message
